mapper.insert: insert into pet_terms (t_num, t_title, t_content, t_cat, t_startdate) values (#{t_num},#{t_title},#{t_content},#{t_cat},#{t_startdate})
mapper.select: select t_num, t_title, t_content, t_cat, to_char(t_startdate,'yyyy.MM.dd') t_startdate from pet_terms order by t_num asc
select t_num, t_title, t_content, t_cat, to_char(t_startdate,'yyyy.MM.dd') t_startdate from pet_terms where t_num=#{t_num}
